[i] Vallite Nobility[/i] – When Arete and Mikoto, Vallite Sisters enter, manifest the top card of your library.
[i]Anankos' Bidding[/i] – Whenever Arete and Mikoto or another creature you control dies, return them to the battlefield tapped with a finality counter on them.
[i]Curse of Silence[/i] – Players can't cast more than one noncreature spell each turn.
Morph {W}{U}{B}
